FILE(GLOB TARGET_SRC *.cpp)
FILE(GLOB TARGET_H *.h)

  SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE "-O0 -DNDEBUG")
  SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO "-O0 -g -DNDEBUG")
ENDIF()

SETUP_PLUGIN(osgga)
